messages.title: Theresa May Needs Your Local Vote
messages.content: In just 8 days after you vote, the EU waits for Theresa May to enter the negotiations that will determine Britain’s future. But she can only get the best deal for you and your family with a large majority in Parliament.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Because we’re leaving the EU, we will be able to control immigration ourselves, and make things fairer for ordinary working people.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Taking Back Control of Our Laws and Our Borders
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Theresa May will end free movement of EU citizens; Jeremy Corbyn won’t do that. He doesn’t believe in controls.

issues.brexitEurope: Theresa May’s plan for Brexit will end free movement of EU citizens; Jeremy Corbyn won’t do that. He doesn’t believe in controls.
issues.economy: Theresa May has a plan to reduce the numbers of people who come to Britain, while bringing in the skilled workers our economy needs to stay strong.
issues.immigration: Theresa May and the Conservatives want to control and reduce immigration. But Jeremy Corbyn doesn’t believe in controls and will increase immigration.

community.content: Theresa May and the Conservatives want to control and reduce immigration.

quotes.text: Theresa May Needs Your Local Vote

examples: But she needs your vote in Gower and votes in every part of the country to give her the best possible negotiating hand.
But Jeremy Corbyn doesn’t believe in controls and will increase immigration.
But he doesn’t believe in controls.
Because we’re leaving the EU, we will be able to control immigration ourselves, and make things fairer for ordinary working people.
But Jeremy Corbyn doesn’t believe in controls and will increase immigration.
Theresa May has a plan to reduce the numbers of people who come to Britain, while bringing in the skilled workers our economy needs to stay strong.
Theresa May’s plan for Brexit will end free movement of EU citizens; Jeremy Corbyn won’t do that. He doesn’t believe in controls.
But Jeremy Corbyn doesn’t believe in controls and will increase immigration.
Jeremy Corbyn won’t do that. He doesn’t believe in controls.
And we can only get Brexit right with the right person doing the job. That’s Theresa May.
Theresa May’s plan for Brexit will end free movement of EU citizens; Jeremy Corbyn won’t do that. He doesn’t believe in controls.
Jeremy Corbyn doesn’t believe in controls and will increase immigration.
